title: Create User Management System
description: Implement a complete user management system with CRUD operations for Ruby on Rails. The system should include user authentication, role-based permissions, and an admin dashboard.
acceptance_criteria: Create User model with validations for email uniqueness and password strength
Create UsersController with full CRUD actions
Build admin dashboard to manage users
Add API endpoints for mobile app integration
Include proper error handling and flash messages
Write RSpec tests for all functionality
